titleStmt.title: A discourse in defense of the Londoners last petition for peace shewing the legality, honesty, justice, and commodity of the said petition to the high Court of Parliament, against the opinions of some factious and turbulent spirits, who desire a continuance of the war. Written by H. G. C. L. B.
titleStmt.author: H. G., B.L.C.

notesStmt.note: Title repeated as a drop-head title on A2r.
Title surrounded by border of type ornaments.
Title vignette of a fleur-de-lys in an ornamental frame.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
